main.title: Shorten, Share, and Track Your Links Instantly!
main.description: Reduce the length of your links in one click and make them easier and more stylish to share, or customize them. Manage your shared links the way you prefer and track their statistics.

text.title: Improve your experience!
text.description: Expand your possibilities by accessing all advanced features: track the history of your links, add notes, manage them as you prefer, and monitor their statistics.

customPrefix.title: Custom Prefix
customPrefix.description: With the custom prefix feature, you can modify the beginning of your short links to make them more recognizable and branded. Instead of a generic link, you will have control over the prefix, making your URL more professional and easier to remember.

password.title: Password
password.description: Keep control of your links with a password! This option allows you to set a password to access the content of the created link, ensuring greater security and privacy.

expirationTime.title: Expiration Time
expirationTime.description: Thanks to the ability to define an expiration time, you can set a time limit for your short links (by defining a specific date and time), after which they will no longer be accessible. Perfect for sharing temporary content without having to delete it manually!

history.title: History
history.description: By accessing your history, you can keep track of all your shortened links in a single dashboard. You will have access to a detailed list with useful information to better manage and edit your URLs.

note.title: Notes
note.description: If you create many links, it might be useful to add personal notes to each of them, making it easier to manage and organize your URLs.

status.title: Enable/Disable
status.description: With this feature, you can enable or disable a short link at any time without permanently deleting it. This allows you to have complete control over the availability of the link.

updateExpirationTime.title: Update Expiration Time
updateExpirationTime.description: By accessing your profile area, you will be able to update the expiration time. This way, you can easily modify the date or access limit of your link without having to generate a new one.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: Monitor the performance of your links and gain insights. You will be able to view information regarding your profile or specific details about each individual created link.
